content.rendered:
Vmaxinfo Instituteworks with industrial projects as well. So it provide all training course with practical approach according to need of industries which build each student to stand in I.T. industries with confidence & deep knowledge in core fields. Each course content lot of practicals and examples to enrich skill of students.

Vmaxinfo Instituteis the only institute which work with I.T. projects  as well. I Tech System provide services like Web Design, Web Development, PHP Application Development, Software Development, Android Application Development, Software Testing, Web Hosting and Domain Registration to different organization. Hence we know the exact requirement of skills required in I.T. industries. We cover all our courses according to I.T. industrial requirement and their expectations.

Our students get training till final implementation for their course like Web Hosting, File Transfer, Domain Registration, Android App on mobile or google play etc.   Our students get practical project experience at the  time of training only. Most of our students get place in I.T. company before completion of course only. Other students also get placed within short period after completion of course and within that period they may come and work with live projects with us.

Vmaxinfo Institutes Projects

  • Web Design
  • Web Development
  • Android Apps Development
  • Digital Marketing
  • Software Testing
  • Web Hosting
  • Domain Registration
  • Cloud Computing
